title: Remove branch management links to simplify Development Task interface
description: Streamline the Development Task UI by removing Branch, PR created and ready for development, and Rebase links that add unnecessary complexity, creating a cleaner interface focused on core development workflow
iWant: to remove Branch, PR created, and Rebase links from Development Task interface
soThat: I can work with a simple and clean task management interface without distracting branch operations
acceptanceCriteria: Branch link is completely removed from Development Task UI
PR created and ready for development link is removed
Rebase link is eliminated from the interface
Development Task remains fully functional without removed links
